Node.Text: Floor six, please! I'm taking Thomas back to his room.
...Fine. I didn't do much. Just a bit sore from jogging earlier.
Yes, he was telling me earlier how much he loved to jog! Especially before the...
Lucy, what have you done today?
I went to the bookstore this morning to buy my materials for next semester! I ran into Thomas outside the store, and we've been together since!
As weird as it sounds, I'm doing hotel management! I was hoping to set up an interview with Mr. Lindson, but now... well, you understand.
You seem a bit clingy with Thomas.
Rude! I'm just providing him with some company. I dislike what you're implying, and I suggest you keep those thoughts to yourself!
This is our floor. Have a nice evening.
